attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE. i first got the app with intentions of supporting our lovely bunker boy trumpy wumpy but after installing it i IMMEDIATELY regretted the whole thing. constantly getting spammed and it wouldn’t stop when you said stop. ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE. i can believe apple would let garbage take over the app store. take this app down IMMEDIATELY.

attributes.title: *VIRUS* horrible app don’t waste your time
attributes.review: when i opened this app up all that popped up was a bunch of adds i accidentally tapped on one and it put a virus in my phone and i had to get a new one. i definitely DO NOT recommend this app unless you want to have to buy a new phone.

attributes.title: Never again!
attributes.review: This app is bad for a multitude of reasons 🤬. it wanted my credit card info and my social security number. it constantly lags my phone and spans lots of notifications . never again will i use this app . it deserves to be taken down .

attributes.title: Caused death
attributes.review: At first I was like yeah sure let’s download it but as soon as I opened the app my dogs died 😔 and then my leg just suddenly got chopped off now I have a fake prosthetic leg and then after that my friend died 🥺😫 and then I couldn’t breathe for like 3 minutes this app is horrible I’m deleting it NOW!!!!

attributes.title: most horrible app
attributes.review: It tried to take all my information 😡 and after downloading it some dude tried to kidnap me and was forcing me to join a cult😔. Then my phone got the corona virus and passed it on to me 🤮. It literally exploded after i had to buy a new one 😐. over all worst app ever👁👄👁.

attributes.title: this app hacked all my bank accounts
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our president 🤩🍊, but when i downloaded it to my iphone the next day all my accounts were hacked 😤😡, this app is horrible, and the Russians probably have control of it, he has lost all my trust!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 🤬😞😭

attributes.title: App for snowflakes only
attributes.review: The terms of condition state that a user can be removed for “libel or derogatory speech” which is ironic considering the copious amount of libel and derogatory speech spewing out of bunker boy from the safety of his “hate free zone” the White House. Plain and simple this app is for skowflakes who are easily triggered and can not withstand any sort of opposing viewpoints or opinions.

attributes.title: Trying to show support
attributes.review:
I’m a long time fan and want to give a shout out to mr. apprentice. It was such a great preview of theses times. Anyway the app appears glitchy and it’s very demanding of my time and $ plus it wants to remove my freedom to chose.
Terrible presentation with graphics that are outdated like an orange spraytanner. I’m done here.

attributes.title: Best app
attributes.review: This app is so useful and efficient. I can look into every issue of Conservative value

attributes.title: My favorite app
attributes.review: It’s so beautiful I can’t compare anything to it, thank you
